root.name: CatDog: Quest for the Golden Hydrant
root.description: Requirements: Windows 95/98: Pentium 133 MHz or higher, 32MB RAM, 30MB free hard disk space, 8x CD-ROM drive, 2MB Win95/98 compatible SVGA video card, 16 bit Win95/98 compatible sound card, DirectX version 6.1 (included) or higher compatible drivers.
